comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Somewhat poignant story to this Memorial to fallen A.I.F. comrades by Pte W.T. Shirley - www.webcitation.org/5qRqIKLqo . Photo certainly post 1928, probably late 1930s. Google Maps satellite for location - maps.google.com.au/maps?ie=UTF8&hq=&hnear=Sydney+...

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks for adding those links, quite a feat for one man to build. From the webcitation site (above) the inscription is: 

"To my glorious comrades of the A.I.F
by the late W. Shirley
No 5756 Pte. 13th Battalion
Died 27th August 1928"
